patthana8.64:1.1: Napītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.64:2.1: Nanapītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanapītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.64:3.1: Napītisahagatañca nanapītisahagatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana8.64:4.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
